remarks.format: ## Remarks 本身并不是复合几何图形，而是由 类用来存储 对象。A is not itself a composite geometry, but is used by the class to store objects. ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreGeometryObjectElements**oneOrMoreGeometryObjectElements* 使用对象元素语法声明的一个或多个对象。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将从第一个开始 ，到最后一个结束，向前搜索集合 。The collection is searched forward starting at the first and ending at the last . 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间与的值成正比 。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of . 也就是说，此方法是 O (*n*) 操作，其中 *n* 等于 。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is equal to . 此方法通过调用来确定相等性 。This method determines equality by calling .
